RuntimeErrorAnalysis.Summary: Invalid username or password provided for Oracle
RuntimeErrorAnalysis.SampleLogOutput: Caused by: org.springframework.jdbc.CannotGetJdbcConnectionException: Could not get JDBC Connection; nested exception is java.sql.SQLException: ORA-01017: invalid username/password; logon denied
RuntimeErrorAnalysis.RegExpPattern: Caused by: org.springframework.jdbc.CannotGetJdbcConnectionException: Could not get JDBC Connection; nested exception is java.sql.SQLException: ORA-01017: invalid username/password; logon denied
RuntimeErrorAnalysis.ProblemDetailHtml: You have provided an invalid username/password combination
RuntimeErrorAnalysis.SolutionDetailHtml: Check that the username/password combination you are using is valid
